text:
e="preserve">Abdelmalek Droukdel (; 20 April 1970 &ndash 3 June 2020) also known by his nom de guerre as Abu Musab Abdel Wadoud (), was the emir leader of the Algerian Islamic militant group Al-Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb (AQIM). He was born in Meftah, Algeria.
His death was announced on 5 June 2020 that Droukdel, and members of his inner circle, had been killed by its forces in an operation in the north of Mali two days earlier.
